New Webbsite and Winter Travels

I haven't been very good about posting this semester. I apologize for that. One reason is because I have been very busy, specifically with creating www.ghostsandspirits.net. It's not quite complete (I'm still waiting for Phil to update several of the pages), but I'm happy with what we have so far. Check out the album, listen to the songs and leave comments if you like.

I'm leaving in two hours for about a month. This time the plan is to go to Shenzhen and Hong Kong, then fly to Thailand for a week, then fly back to China and go to Yunnan, Tibet and Xinjiang. I'll be traveling with Drew Langlie, who I traveled with last winter.

About

Well, I'm back in Qinhuangdao from Hong Kong and Taiwan. My time in Hong Kong and Taiwan was enjoyable, but not very eventful. I've got more about my time in China that I plan to blog about, but recently I've focused all my computer time on finishing a project that I'll be putting on my resume for when I apply for jobs. So blogging just isn't a priority right now.

The Olympics don't officially start until tomorrow night, but some of the events have already began. I went to the USA vs. Norway women's soccer game last night. Unfortunately, we lost 2-0, but it was fun to go. I'll be going to 3 different events in Beijing before flying home in 6 days!
